Title: Ali
Writer: Gregory Allen Howard (story), Stephen J. Rivele (screenplay), Christopher Wilkinson (screenplay), Eric Roth (screenplay), Michael Mann (screenplay)
Actors: Will Smith, Jamie Foxx, Jon Voight, Mario Van Peebles
Plot: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 25 nominations.
Production: Picture Entertainment Corporation, Peters Entertainment, Columbia Pictures, Initial Entertainment Group, Overbrook Entertainment, Forward Pass
